data.title: McGeheeSchools.ORG
data.text:
ONLINE RESOURCES

MySchoolInfo - My School Info allows the public to search and compare public schools and districts from across the State of Arkansas.

ADEDataCenter - ADE Data Center is a collection of data systems, data tools and informational reports for educators, policy makers, teachers, parents, school districts, and anyone interested in official data from the Arkansas Department of Education (ADE).

ADE Quick Links - Quick access to ADE Data Center resources in a quick easy mobile additive 'mobile app' type interface.

AETN Ideas - ArkansasIDEAS connects K-12 educators with quality, ADE-approved professional development and educational opportunities, as well as a wide range of training on multiple platforms, thousands of classroom resources, and state and national initiatives, such as STEM and TESS. Access Linkendin Learning [lynda.com] through AETN Portal for even more professional development and educational content.

Triand - Triand is a user-friendly way to transfer student transcripts between districts, schools and colleges. Public schools in Arkansas are required to use the electronic transcript system pursuant to Ark. Code Ann. §6-80-107.

studentGPS -The studentGPS is a free online tool that contains a collection of district, school and student educational data. The studentGPS provides educators with access to historical, timely, and predictive information that is centrally located and accessible by any Internet enabled device. The studentGPS is designed to help educators make data-driven decisions for students.

ADE ASIS - Arkansas Student Intervention System (ASIS) is a free, online tool that provides educators with an intervention workspace for all students. Interventions in ASIS can be customized to include deficiencies, accelerations, attendance, discipline, behavior, and more!

ARKANSAS DIGITAL SANDBOX - the newest and safest way to collaborate, store, and share multi-media in a closed, social learning network.

Virtual Arkansas - Virtual Arkansas offers supplemental online programs to Arkansas school districts through participating education cooperatives. School districts can can choose from a variety of courses and options to meet the needs of their students.

Kuder - Advance College & Career Readiness for Arkansas Students in grades 8-12. - A customized version of Kuder Navigator® enables Arkansas schools to implement the Act 930 of 2017-mandates to address preparation for college, career, and community engagement.

McGehee School Mobile App - Get the App

by bluetreeapps
